department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: Replacement of Storm and Sewage Pumps at the Embassy of Canada to China in Beijing
description: His Majesty the King in right of Canada, represented by the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD), is initiating a process to prequalify contractors for the replacement of the storm pump system and the sewage pump system at the Embassy of Canada to China in Beijing...
tags: *Travaux de pose de drains et de plomberie (eau)
